property.name: TotalEarnings
property.formula: ( SELECT SUM(PO.AmountToBePaid) FROM KC_Payouts PO INNER JOIN KC_GameResults GR ON PO.GameId = GR.GameId AND PO.Place + 1 = GR.Place INNER JOIN KC_Games G ON GR.GameId = G.GameId WHERE date(G.GameDate) BETWEEN '2009-01-01' AND '2009-12-31' AND GR.PlayerId = PlayerId)

property.name: GamesPlayed
property.formula: ( SELECT COUNT(GPA.PlayerId) FROM KC_GamePlayerAssignments GPA INNER JOIN KC_Games G ON GPA.GameId = G.GameId WHERE date(G.GameDate) BETWEEN '2009-01-01' AND '2009-12-31' AND GPA.PlayerId = PlayerId)
